statements: DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 3 AND username = 'jane_smith';
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE username = 'jane_smith' AND preferences LIKE '%dark_mode%';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' AND notifications_enabled = true;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1234 AND theme = 'dark';
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE sessions, user_roles FROM sessions INNER JOIN user_roles ON sessions.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_roles.role_name = 'Admin';
DELETE users, user_preferences FROM users INNER JOIN user_preferences ON users.id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE user_preferences.theme = 'dark' AND user_preferences.language = 'english';
